page.title: 09School Summer Picnic
page.content: Since Mr Wickes has been headmaster at the village school, we have had a School Summer Picnic. The{whole school goes for a{day trip}and provides their own{picnic lunch}which we have at a {beauty_spot.Any parent who wishes to {come may do so.}The school endeavours to pay the cost of transport involved. This year,1985,26 children plus 16 adults in 8 vehicles went to the Forest of Dean and visited{Puzzle Wood We had our{picnic}there. The weather was sunny but a bit windy. A mile away is the{Clearwell Iron Mine.}We walked down and round the mine. It was cold & eerie.We went down Symonds Yat Rock to the{Jubilee Maze}at Symonds Yat.We all went round the maze.It took half an hour.Then we played Tag in the Maze.It was good.There is a viewing platform where our mums stood and shouted to us which way to go.{We had a lovely day..
